effect.sun_moon: Inflicts regular damage. If the target is paralyzed, this move has double power, and the target is cured of its paralysis.
effect.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: Inflicts regular damage. If the target is paralyzed, this move has double power, and the target is cured of its paralysis.
effect.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: Inflicts regular damage. If the target is paralyzed, this move has double power, and the target is cured of its paralysis.

short_effect.sun_moon: If the target is paralyzed, inflicts double damage and cures the paralysis.
short_effect.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: If the target is paralyzed, inflicts double damage and cures the paralysis.
short_effect.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: If the target is paralyzed, inflicts double damage and cures the paralysis.

flavor_text.sun_moon: This attack’s power is doubled when used on a target with paralysis. This also cures the target’s paralysis, however.
flavor_text.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: This attack’s power is doubled when used on a target with paralysis. This also cures the target’s paralysis, however.
flavor_text.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: This attack’s power is doubled when used on a target with paralysis. This also cures the target’s paralysis, however.
